TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase

summary.span: 作為在網頁上裝載 控制項之網頁組件控制項集合中的主要控制項。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是複合控制項，以涵蓋網頁上定義的區域，並包含伺服器控制項。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control that covers a defined region on a Web page and contains server controls. 區域的主要功能是它包含，控制項的版面配置設定，並為這些控制項提供常見的使用者介面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 如需區域以及如何在 Web 組件的應用程式中使用它們的一般資訊，請參閱參考文件，基底類別，並[Web 組件控制集概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100))。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100)). 控制項是其中一個基本 Web 組件控制項集合中的控制項。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. Web 組件的主要功能是修改 （或個人化） 網頁的終端使用者的能力根據他們的喜好設定，並將其個人化設定儲存為未來的瀏覽器工作階段。A key feature of Web Parts is the ability of end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 組件頁面的其中一個層面包括編輯;使用者可以編輯的外觀、 版面配置、 行為以及其他屬性的可見控制項。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes editing; users can edit the appearance, layout, behavior, and other properties of the visible controls. Web 組件控制項集合中的數個控制項提供的編輯功能，包括控制項。Several controls in the Web Parts control set provide the editing features, including the control. 控制項，便顯示在 Web 組件頁面進入編輯模式，它提供各種可以用來個人化的控制項控制項。An control becomes visible when a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and it makes available various controls that can be used to personalize controls. 控制項是非常類似於其父代，類別，且只有一個主要差異：控制項會提供用來在區域樣板，參考在其屬性。The control is very similar to its parent, the class, with one key difference: The control provides a zone template, referenced in its property. 在區域樣板會新增宣告中的頁面保存格式內容的能力。The zone template adds the ability to declare content in the page persistence format. 網頁開發人員可以放置控制網頁、 宣告式標記中新增一個子系``項目，會在``項目，加入宣告式參考控制項。Page developers can place an control in the declarative markup of a Web page, add a child `` element, and within the `` element, add declarative references to controls. 控制項也有一個方法中， ，這會覆寫中的基底方法類別。The control also has a method, , which overrides a base method in the class. 這個方法是必要的讓控制項可以建立包含任何在區域樣板以宣告方式新增至區域的控制項。This method is necessary so that an control can create the zone template to contain any controls that are added to the zone declaratively. > [!NOTE] > 中的按鈕UI 需要用戶端指令碼才能正常運作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果瀏覽器中停用指令碼，使用者將無法執行動作，透過UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記，也可能不符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 此範例會建立繼承自一個自訂編輯器區域類別，並使用 Web 組件頁面中。The example creates a custom editor zone that inherits from the class, and uses it in a Web Parts page. 在程式碼範例有三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 參考自訂的網頁控制項。A Web page that references the custom control. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 針對更多詳細會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is a Web page. 頁面頂端附近`Register`使用者控制項指示詞。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 在頁面中以宣告的使用者控制項標記`uc1:`項目的前置詞。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `uc1:` prefix for the element. 請注意，以下``項目``包含數個項目控制項，還有一些標記和設定屬性，以判斷其外觀和行為。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains several controls, with some tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 另外還有數種方法，存取各種成員以程式設計方式控制。There are also a number of methods that access various members of the control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要顯示的編輯 UI，您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。To display the editing UI, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 顯示編輯 UI 中，使用您所見的宣告式和以程式設計方式使用效果類別成員。With the editing UI visible, you can see the effects of the declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果您想要建立自訂區域以獲得更好的控制，透過編輯 UI 的呈現，您可以直接繼承自類別，只要您不需要提供新增的網頁開發人員的區域範本支援以宣告方式控制至您的區域。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone to gain greater control over the rendering of the editing UI, you can inherit directly from the class, as long as you do not need to provide zone template support for page developers to add controls to your zone declaratively.

para.span: 在此情況下，您會加入所有以程式設計方式控制至區域。

span.span: In such a case, you would add all controls to a zone programmatically.

para.span: 如果您想要提供區域範本支援，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you want to provide zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 以頁面保存格式，建立在區域樣板中宣告的所有 控制項。

span.span: Creates all the controls declared within a zone template in page persistence format.

returns.span: ，包含在區域樣板中宣告之所有 控制項的參考。

span.span: An that contains references to all the controls declared within the zone template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底的方法，以建立只在區域樣板中宣告的控制項。The method overrides the base method to create only the controls that are declared within the zone template. 任何其他必須以程式設計方式加入控制項新增至的區域。Any other controls added to the zone must be added programmatically. 做法是，比方說，藉由實作介面中控制項。This can be done, for example, by implementing the interface in a control. 然後，在覆寫方法中，您可以新增的自訂集合至區域的控制項。Then, in the overridden method, you can add a collection of custom controls to a zone.

exception.span: 目前的 控制項並沒有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };
member this.ZoneTemplate : System.Web.UI.ITemplate with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 提供樣板，以頁面保存格式將子控制項包含在 控制項之中。

span.span: Provides a template to contain child controls within an control in page persistence format.

value.span: 區域樣板，做為區域中子控制項的容器。

span.span: An zone template that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是之間的主要差異類別和基底類別。The property is the key difference between the class and the base class. 透過新增對在區域樣板中，支援類別可讓網頁開發人員，將子內控制在網頁上的宣告式標記的控制項。By adding support for a zone template, the class enables page developers to place child controls within an control in the declarative markup of a Web page. 在區域樣板做為子控制項的容器。The zone template acts as a container for the child controls. > [!NOTE] > Set 存取子屬性呼叫方法，它會強制集合中重新建立範本的控制項宣告。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls declared in the template to be recreated. 這樣的任何變更的範本，可辨識的內容。This causes any changes in the contents of the template to be recognized. 以宣告方式在使用區域樣板控制項，加入一組``標記，以及參考標記之間的控制項。To use a zone template declaratively within an control, you add a pair of `` tags, and reference controls between the tags. 只有一個區域的範本會呈現每個執行個體控制項 (因此，沒有新增多個沒有理由``項目控制項)。Only one zone template is rendered per instance of an control (therefore, there is no reason to add multiple `` elements to an control). 此外，區域的範本控制項可以包含衍生自組件控制項類別。Also, the zone template of an control can contain only part controls that derive from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative use of the property. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼，例如類別概觀。The full code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以放在``中的項目控制項。The code example demonstrates how controls can be placed within a `` element in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要顯示 編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。To display the editing user interface (UI), you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 顯示編輯 UI 中，您會看到數個控制項中已宣告``項目。With the editing UI visible, you can see the several controls that are declared within the `` element.
